statements: SELECT * FROM customer_conversations WHERE customer_id = '65b16b83-153d-4b72-9a01-9727992ff71d';
SELECT conversation_id, timestamp FROM customer_conversations WHERE platform = 'Twitter' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, conversation FROM customer_conversations WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND platform = 'Facebook';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_conversations WHERE customer_id = '4322d12f-607d-4c78-b21b-5e12e2dcb5fb';
SELECT MAX(timestamp), MIN(timestamp) FROM customer_conversations WHERE platform = 'WhatsApp';
SELECT * FROM customer_conversations WHERE platform = 'Twitter' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT conversation_id, customer_id, platform FROM customer_conversations WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_conversations WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND platform IN ('Facebook', 'Instagram') ORDER BY platform ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT conversation, COUNT(conversation_id) AS conversation_count FROM customer_conversations GROUP BY conversation HAVING COUNT(conversation_id) > 1 ORDER BY conversation_count DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT platform) AS platform_count FROM customer_conversations GROUP BY customer_id HAVING platform_count > 1 ORDER BY platform_count DESC, customer_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM social_media_conversations;
SELECT conversation_id, platform, timestamp FROM social_media_conversations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT conversation_id, platform, message FROM social_media_conversations WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT sentiment, feedback FROM customer_insights WHERE sentiment = 'Positive';
SELECT customer_id, conversation_id, sentiment FROM customer_insights ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_conversations WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT conversation_id, timestamp FROM social_media_conversations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT platform, COUNT(*) AS total_conversations FROM social_media_conversations GROUP BY platform;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.sentiment, s.message FROM customer_insights c JOIN social_media_conversations s ON c.conversation_id = s.conversation_id;
SELECT c.sentiment, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_insights c WHERE c.sentiment = 'Positive' GROUP BY c.sentiment;
SELECT * FROM CustomerConversations;
SELECT conversation_id, customer_id, message FROM CustomerConversations WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(conversation_id) AS conversation_count FROM CustomerConversations GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT conversation_id, timestamp FROM CustomerConversations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT conversation_id, sentiment, topic FROM ConversationInsights WHERE sentiment = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM CustomerConversations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT conversation_id, customer_id, message FROM CustomerConversations WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, social_media_platform, followers_count FROM CustomerSocialMedia WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT c.conversation_id, c.message, i.sentiment FROM CustomerConversations c JOIN ConversationInsights i ON c.conversation_id = i.conversation_id WHERE i.sentiment = 'positive';
SELECT c.conversation_id, c.timestamp, i.topic FROM CustomerConversations c JOIN ConversationInsights i ON c.conversation_id = i.conversation_id WHERE i.topic LIKE '%customer service%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerConversations;
SELECT customer_id, message FROM CustomerConversations WHERE conversation_id = 123;
SELECT name, email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPlatforms ORDER BY platform_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_category, preference_details FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM CustomerConversations;
SELECT customer_id, message, timestamp FROM CustomerConversations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM CustomerConversations GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDetails JOIN CustomerPreferences ON CustomerDetails.customer_id = CustomerPreferences.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_conversations ORDER BY conversation_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM social_media_platforms WHERE platform_type = 'Social';
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_description FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_name LIKE '%food%';
SELECT profile_id, customer_name, profile_picture_url FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, conversation_text FROM customer_conversations;
SELECT feedback_date, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT preference_name, preference_description FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY preference_name DESC;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM social_media_platforms WHERE platform_type = 'Social';
SELECT customer_name, profile_picture_url FROM customer_profiles WHERE profile_id IN (1, 3, 5);
